Plot: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.
Title: The Horse Whisperer
Writer: Nick Evans (novel), Eric Roth (screenplay), Richard LaGravenese (screenplay)
Actors: Robert Redford, Kristin Scott Thomas, Sam Neill, Dianne Wiest
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 18 nominations.
